text: Israeli vahe'mofo Hankavenentake Ruotage Ra Anumzamo'a amanage huno hu'ne, Tamagrama tamagu'a rukrahe hutma nagrite'ma eta tamarimpa frunema mani'sanuta tamaguvazi zana erigahaze. Nagra kegava huramantegahue. Hanki tamagrama akoheta mani'neta Nagri'ma antahi namisnazana, Nagra tamazeri hankavetigahue. Hianagi tamagra ke'ni'a antahinamita amagera nonteta,
